summary: Updated 8 skill files to use {NNN}_{SLUG} format for directory paths. All path templates now use 3-digit padding for consistent lexicographic sorting.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary documenting all skill file updates for padded directory paths

completion_data.completion_summary: Updated 8 skill files (research, planner, implementer, neovim-implementation, latex-implementation, typst-implementation, git-workflow) to use {NNN}_{SLUG} format in path templates for directory numbers.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Updated path templates in .claude/skills/ to use {NNN}_{SLUG} pattern. No CLAUDE.md changes needed as the standard was already documented in artifact-formats.md.

next_steps: Review implementation and verify skill files work correctly with padded paths
